arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Harry Kane regrets missed chances after a narrow win over Wolfsburg
arts.sum: But Wolfsburg always stayed in the game, they scored, even at an important time, and made it stressful for us in the last few minutes. Striker Harry Kane felt that the game could have been a lot less stressful had Bayern been more efficient with their shooting.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany is happy with Bayern Munich’s start to the year after overcoming Ralph Hasenhüttl and VFL Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Three games and three wins later, it is safe to say Bayern has indeed started the year well, especially after overcoming an in-form VFL Wolfsburg team. After a slightly bumpy end to 2024 for Bayern Munich, as the league leaders dropped 5 points and were dumped out of the DFB Pokal in the span of 5 games, it was imperative that Bayern started the year on the right foot.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane says Bayern Munich squad is not focused on contract situations after Wolfsburg win
arts.sum: For Kane, he explained how all of the contract talk is just outside noise for the players, and that the squad is not letting it distract them from their football. Kane stated that the squad is only focused on their football and winning matches, unaffected by outside noise in the press.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany praises Leon Goretzka’s professionalism after successful start: “If you do your job, you’ll get your chance.”
arts.sum: The ongoing saga of out-of-favour former German national team midfielder Leon Goretzka received another interesting twist on Saturday when the 29-year-old recorded his second and third Bundesliga goals of the…

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany believes Leon Goretzka’s new squad status can set an example for others
arts.sum: From missing out on the matchday squad to being the man of the match and Vincent Kompany’s preferred choice to pair Joshua Kimmich at the heart of the midfield, Leon Goretzka’s return to the top at Bayern Munich has been impressive. After Bayern’s Matchday 18 victory over VfL Wolfsburg Kompany singled out Goretzka for praise (captured via @iMiaSanMia ), saying, “Leon’s story is good for the team because there are probably other players who are in a difficult situation.

arts.ttl: Goretzka earns praise from Kompany after brace against Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bayern coach Vincent Kompany was full of praise for Leon Goretzka after the midfielder's brace against Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s topsy-turvy 3-2 win over VFL Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Mohamed El Amine Amoura was already in good form heading into Wolfsburg’s fixture against Bayern, bagging four goals and one assist in the previous six matches, so it was hardly a surprise to see him do well today. He also provided Bayern with crucial solidity against Wolfsburg’s in form attack, who had scored at least three goals in five of their last seven appearances.

arts.ttl: Three Observations from Bayern Munich’s 3-2 victory against VfL Wolfsburg
arts.sum: After a tumultuous start to the season filled with countless links away from the club, including Bayern openly stating their desire to offload the 29-year-old midfielder, Leon Goretzka has made a statement of his own. Contrary to the scoreline, Bayern Munich put in a dominant display and with better finishing (and a more favourable referee) ultimately could have won the game by a three or four goal margin.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany plays it safe with Jamal Musiala vs. Wolfsburg
arts.sum: One of the most curious lineup selections for Bayern Munich ahead of the Wolfsburg match was the exclusion of Jamal Musiala. Kompany says Jamal Musiala is still not an option for the starting lineup and no risk was taken with him, but hopefully he could play a role later in the game pic.twitter.com/byXa89KOFI

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bayern, Stuttgart, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim; Bochum hold Leipzig in six-goal thriller
arts.sum: Matchday 19 brought a plentiful supply of goals and thrilling action to the Bundesrepublik. Stuttgart cruised to a big victory over Freiburg. Bayern, St.Pauli and Hoffenheim all bagged three vital points each. Bochum overturned a three-goal deficit to draw with Leipzig.
